verses.verse: In Judah,<WH3063> God<WH430> is known.<WH3045> His name<WH8034> is great<WH1419> in Israel.<WH3478>
His tabernacle<WH5520> is also in Salem;<WH8004> His dwelling place<WH4585> in Zion.<WH6726>
There he broke<WH7665> the flaming arrows<WH7565> of the bow,<WH7565> the shield,<WH4043> and the sword,<WH2719> and the weapons of war.<WH4421> Selah.<WH5542>
Glorious<WH215> are you,<WH117> and excellent, more than mountains<WH2042> of game.<WH2964>
Valiant<WH47> men lie plundered,<WH7997> they have slept<WH5123> their last sleep.<WH8142> None of the men<WH582> of war<WH2428> can lift<WH4672> their hands.<WH3027>
At your rebuke,<WH1606> God<WH430> of Jacob,<WH3290> both chariot<WH7393> and horse<WH5483> are cast into a deep sleep.<WH7290>
You,<WH3372> even you, are to be feared. Who can stand<WH5975> in your sight<WH6440> when<WH227> you are angry?<WH639>
You pronounced<WH8085> judgment<WH1779> from heaven.<WH8064> The earth<WH776> feared,<WH3372> and was silent,<WH8252>
when God<WH430> arose<WH6965> to judgment,<WH4941> to save<WH3467> all the afflicted<WH6035> ones of the earth.<WH776> Selah.<WH5542>
Surely the wrath<WH2534> of man<WH120> praises<WH3034> you.<WH7611> The survivors of your wrath<WH2534> are restrained.<WH2296>
Make vows<WH5087> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and fulfill<WH7999> them!<WH5439> Let all of his neighbors bring<WH2986> presents<WH7862> to him who is to be feared.<WH4172>
He will cut off<WH1219> the spirit<WH7307> of princes.<WH5057> He is feared<WH3372> by the kings<WH4428> of the earth.<WH776>
